item.title: SQL - Getting Started
item.description: 1. Introduction Welcome to our SQL series! SQL (Structured Query Language) is a programming language designed for managing and manipulating data stored in relational databases. It is a powerful tool for performing a wide range of tasks, from creating and modifying tables, to querying and analyzing data, to managing user access and security. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced developer, learning SQL is an essential skill for anyone working with data.
